channel.title: What Specs do my VPS need?
channel.description:
Hey guys, sorry if this thread is in the wrong section :/ So yeah, what specs do a VPS need to run a server with about 100-200+ people at once, being stable without lagg? I was thinking about this, but i dont know how many players it can hold.. what do you guys think?
VPS Software: vePortal™ / OpenVZ™ CPU: 1500MHZ GUARANTEED Memory: 1GB GUARANTEED Disk Space: 50GB (RAID BASED CONFIG) Bandwidth: 1000GB/MONTH IP Addresses: 2 (IPv4) + IPv6 Management: BASIC MANAGED DDOS Protection: CISCO™ GUARD Feel free to post recomended specs :) Thanks :D

item.title: What Specs do my VPS need?
item.dc:creator: @marcbob marcbob
item.description:
@marcbob wrote:

This is more general than server help. I think it would be enough depending on your server.

Read full topic
item.source: What Specs do my VPS need?

item.title: What Specs do my VPS need?
item.dc:creator: @urelind urelind
item.description:
@urelind wrote:

Hey guys, sorry if this thread is in the wrong section
So yeah, what specs do a VPS need to run a server with about 100-200+ people at once, being stable without lagg?
I was thinking about this, but i dont know how many players it can hold… what do you guys think?

VPS Software: vePortal™ / OpenVZ™
CPU: 1500MHZ GUARANTEED
Memory: 1GB GUARANTEED
Disk Space: 50GB (RAID BASED CONFIG)
Bandwidth: 1000GB/MONTH
IP Addresses: 2 (IPv4) + IPv6
Management: BASIC MANAGED
DDOS Protection: CISCO™ GUARD
Feel free to post recomended specs
Thanks
